content:
On the day of March 20, Russian invaders hit Maksimivka of Donetsk region. Two people were killed, another was injured.

About thisinformsHead of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin.

“The Russians hit the village at lunch today, hit a private home. The bodies of two men in 1964 and 1975 were found under the rubble, ”the message reads.

The head of the region added that a 72-year-old woman was injured and transported to hospital.

The rescue operation at the scene is completed.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Kharkiv because of the RF strikealready knownabout three dead and five wounded.
title: In Donetsk, the Russians hit a private house: two men were killed
description: About it reports the head of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin. “The Russians hit the village ...
author: Army Inform
